description: After applying the security update KB-120.0.2210.121 for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 120.0.2210.121, users may experience the necessity to restart their browser to fully implement the updates. This behavior can be observed when attempting to access certain web functionalities that utilize the updated WebGPU features affected by the vulnerability CVE-2024-0225. If the update is not applied, users might notice degraded performance or the inability to access specific browser capabilities. Restarting the browser is crucial to ensure that the latest security patches are effective and that the browsing environment remains secure. Users can verify their version by navigating through the Edge menu: Help and Feedback -> About Microsoft Edge.
